website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Spirit Turf greets the soccer pitch in a bright red colorway and unique graphic print that is welcomed by most users. Fans of this soccer cleat mentioned of its beautiful design as well as its excellent quality and notable comfortable fit. Some of the things they didn’t like so much included the slightly tight and small fit of this Puma model. Overall, even with its issues in fit and sizing, the Puma Spirit Turf is still an impressive, not to mention, a very reasonably-priced cleat.
pros: From what several users had to say, the Puma Spirit Turf is one beautiful-looking shoe
Many users claimed that these soccer cleats feel comfortable on feet
Some reviewers appreciated the impressive quality of this soccer cleat considering its somewhat affordable price
Majority of its users were satisfied to the overall performance of these turf cleats
cons: As some wearers observed, the Puma Spirit Turf feels a little bit tight on the foot
Sizing on this soccer cleat is quite off, said a few of its testers

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid, this has been a great shoe for football (soccer). It has held up for two seasons of heavy use, and so far there are no holes/tears. I will say, however, and this is true for all soccer shoes, it gets hot on artificial turf. I would suggest some vents in the shoes or the shoe tongue have some holes so some venting can occur. The orange color seems to keep it a bit cooler than darker colored shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dtobaru

customer_reviews.title: I ordered half size larger than my outdoor cleats
customer_reviews.text: I wear a snug fitting firm ground Puma Evo power 1.3 in a men's 10.5. The indoor shoe construction is less forgiving, so I ordered one half size up. Fit is pretty similar to my outdoor Puma cleats, so I'm pleased. I was worried that they wouldn't work at first because they fit tight, and hurt a little, but after a couple games of play they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K

customer_reviews.title: A little snug, order up a half size or more.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened them up, I got a size probably 1/2 to 1 size to large because it was all they had in stock, but it fit very snug, so hopefully they won't be too tight after breaking them in. May want to go up a 1/2 size if not sure. Seems great, perfect quality matching the price I paid. I will update if falls apart but will do it's job great.
customer_reviews.author: Queens, NY Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for recreational football/soccer
customer_reviews.text: These boots have a great price to performance ratio in my opinion. I feel like they are a definite improvement over using normal cleats for grass on turf, and that I have prevented some minor ankle injuries by wearing them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin L.

customer_reviews.title: No toe protection
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers feel great and are very light. They were comfortable from the first time wearing them. I used them for a soccer tournament after one day. These sneakers have NO protection over your toes tho. I ended up with a black and blue toe nagger getting stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeEater23

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material - not worth the value price
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly thin upper material. They started coming apart at the front after two uses. Unfortunately just past my return date. These are cheap and poor quality in my experience. I will be spending more for a quality shoe. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rafiki

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit very small, might have been comfortable if I had gotten a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Janice Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got a gr8 deal on price...but felt it gave me heel pain. used a dr scholls and it made it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good touch on the ball
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for good indoor / turf shoes for a long time and none have fit right until these. The fit perfectly, are very comfortable, and have a great touch to them.
customer_reviews.author: brre1234

customer_reviews.title: These fit my feet a little tight.
customer_reviews.text: These fit my feet a little tight. I am a size 13 medium width and these are a little on the snug side.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Turf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Play indoor soccer with it. It's small for what I got, so get it like 0.5 size larger if you're ordering one. Quality is good however, playing indoor 3 times a week for a month now, still holding up pretty good. Turf grip is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Luong

customer_reviews.title: Decent cleats
customer_reviews.text: Played once wearing this - so far feels good. However, it does feel a little too long compared to its width.
customer_reviews.author: Abu S. Reaz

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect.. Good buy for somone who's just starting ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect..Good buy for somone who's just starting their practice..
customer_reviews.author: Jits

customer_reviews.title: great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these for indoor soccer and for outdoor soccer on turf fields. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ricard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: They seem small but it's just an optical illusion as they fit perfectly. The grip on the pitch is just perfect for quick moves and changing direction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and great quality for an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.author: Onefitmom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lite , a little slick on top .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable, but I normally wear 10.5 but this fits like a 10. Had to resell them.
customer_reviews.author: TGC

customer_reviews.title: Order at least a half size larger.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked like it was gonna be a nice shoe but the sizing was way off. My item felt like it was at least a half size smaller than it should of bn.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable and was not worth the lower price
customer_reviews.text: Made of very cheap material, not comfortable and was not worth the lower price. Spend more money to get proper indoor shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchase it for my cousin and he loves it...
customer_reviews.author: Rickell

customer_reviews.title: Value for $
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting. Durable. So many words to describe this turf.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice and it fit for in and out door field
customer_reviews.author: FADI

customer_reviews.title: Tried in store for the size and amazon is cheaper
customer_reviews.text: They fit better than adidas, which is too narrow in the arch area.
customer_reviews.author: Summertime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look really cool and are comfortable, Puma quality is always high!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: This boot has a bulky, rounded front, not the typical tapered and narrowing front that I like in a cleat. The nobs on the bottom are nice and large and I'm kind of bummed that the overall shape of the boot didn't please me, because for the price and the nice big nobs, I wanted it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome.. not using for soccer but for boomerang throwing :}}}}
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: just glad you had his size
customer_reviews.text: He's a growing 13 year old, just glad you had his size.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Klocko

product_meta.title: Puma - Mens Spirit Tt Shoes
product_meta.description: *Get in the game with this superb soccer cleat *Soft, durable synthetic upper *Lace-up closure *Fabric lining *Cushioned footbed *Multi-stud rubber sole designed for use on turf surfaces
